metadata.feature_description: Multi-language support for page management interface

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify all UI strings are localized

steps.action: Navigated to Pages panel in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Pages panel displays with localized UI strings from EvoqPages.resx
steps.actual: Pages panel displayed with all UI strings properly localized including: Pages heading, Details/Permissions/Advanced tabs, Name/Title/Description labels, Workflow, Link Tracking, Save Page Template button

steps.action: Clicked Save Page Template dropdown to reveal menu options
steps.expected: Dropdown shows localized options from resource file
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed localized strings: 'Evoq Page Template' (EvoqPageTemplate.Text) and 'Export as XML' (ExportAsXML) matching the resource file keys

steps.action: Clicked Evoq Page Template to open template creation form
steps.expected: Template form displays with localized labels
steps.actual: Template form displayed with localized labels: 'Template Name*' (TemplateName.Text), 'Description' (Description.Text), Cancel and Save buttons

steps.action: Reviewed EvoqPages.resx resource file and compared with UI display
steps.expected: UI strings should match resource file values
steps.actual: Confirmed resource key mapping is correct. UI displays match the .resx file values: WorkflowTitle.Text='Workflow', LinkTrackingTitle.Text='Link Tracking', SaveAsTemplate.Text='Save Page Template', On.Text='On', Off.Text='Off', EvoqPageTemplate.Text='Evoq Page Template', ExportAsXML='Export as XML', TemplateName.Text='Template Name', Description.Text='Description'

observations: Only English (en-US) resource file exists for EvoqPages (EvoqPages.resx). No language-specific variants like EvoqPages.de-DE.resx or EvoqPages.es-ES.resx were found in the codebase.
The site has multiple languages enabled (English and Spanish visible in language selector), but the Pages PersonaBar module only provides English localization resources.
Language switching would fall back to English (default) for all Pages panel strings when using non-English languages due to missing localized resource files.
